name: THE COALITION FOR TATTOO SAFETY
sampleDescriptions: Educating the FDA and Congress about cosmetics regulation. Ensuring that they understand industry processes and standards. Gathering information about potential regulation.
Educating the FDA and Congress about cosmetics regulation. Ensuring that they understand industry processes and standards. S726 - educating Congress on potential negative impact of language on tattoo
